channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Multibranch Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Multibranch Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25179|2024-08-03T04:36:05.767Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20multibranch%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Multibranch Plugin 706.vd43c65dec013 and earlier follows symbolic links to locations outside of the checkout directory for the configured SCM when reading files using the readTrusted step, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25175|2024-08-03T04:36:06.194Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20multibranch%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Multibranch Plugin 706.vd43c65dec013 and earlier uses the same checkout directories for distinct SCMs for the readTrusted step, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller through crafted SCM contents.
